revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Papillico Kapiba |image = Papillico Kapiba.jpg |caption = Papillico Kapiba |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Kapiba]] |level = 17 - 18 |area = [[Ribbi Flats]] ([[Tonic Waters]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Papillico Kapibas''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. They are members of the [[Kapiba]] family, and can be found at level 17 - 18 at [[Tonic Waters]] near [[Killy Fors]] in the [[Ribbi Flats]].
== Drops == * [[Sweet Kapiba Lard]] * [[Withered Kapiba Branch]]
{{clr}}
== Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Papillico Kapiba |image = |caption = Papillico Kapiba |type = [[Kapiba]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |level = 55 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Gauntlet: Intermediate]]'' |respawn = No |hp = 67,878 |strength = 236 |healing = 315 |dexterity = 196 |agility = 198 |physdef = 10% |ethdef = -10% |critrate = 8% |guardrate = 0% }} A '''Papillico Kapiba''' is a [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] that is fought at level 55 on Stage 20 of the [[Archsage's Gauntlet]] [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge]] ''[[Gauntlet: Intermediate]]''.
=== Skills === The Papillico Kapiba has the following skills: * Deals 10% less damage but takes 30% less damage.
=== Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances}} {{clr}} === Arts === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:120%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes |- <!-- Auto-attack --> |'''''Auto-Attack''''' |Physical |One Target |1 |80% | | |- <!-- Arts Slot 0 --> |'''Stepping Stone''' |Physical |One Target |1 |250% |[[Topple (XC3)|Topple]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to [[Knockback (XC3)|Knockback]] and [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] during Art. *Topple is only inflicted if target is suffering [[Break (XC3)|Break]]. *Damage is boosted by 200% when attacking the target from behind. |- <!-- Arts Slot 1 --> |'''Lazy Sway''' |Physical |One Target |1 |200% | |style="text-align:left;"| *Immune to Knockback and Blowdown during Art. |- <!-- Arts Slot 2 --> |'''Burrowing Rocket''' |Physical |AOE around User |1 |160% |Break |style="text-align:left;"| *Evades enemy attacks during the Art. |} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}}
[[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Kapibas]] [[Category:XC3 Level 16-20 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 51-55 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:The Ragmos Desolation Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Kapibas]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

While this buff is active, all other buffs on the affected character will have their timers (if applicable) paused, preventing them from expiring. Some timed buffs can still be removed while this bu..."
revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Status | title = Pause Buff Timer | caption = Freezes timer on other active buffs. | image = XC3 Pause Buff Timer.png | type = Buff | base-duration = 20.0s | max-duration = 40.0s | rng-applicable = No }} '''Pause Buff Timer''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}}. While this buff is active, all other buffs on the affected character will have their timers (if applicable) paused, preventing them from expiring.
Some timed buffs can still be removed while this buff is active if conditions for their removal are met, such as for [[Delayed Healing]], which is removed if the character is reduced to low HP. ==Distribution== ===Arts=== *[[Glittering Melody]] ([[Troubadour]]) [[Category:XC3 Status]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Pellurid Igna |image = Pellurid Igna FR.jpg |caption = Pellurid Igna |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Igna]] |level = 45
98-100 |area = [[Elaice Highway]] ([[Nid Cave]])
[[Erythia Sea]] ([[Rebellion Cave]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Pellurid Ignas''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 45 in [[Nid Cave]] on [[Elaice Highway]], or at level 98-100 in [[Rebellion Cave]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} == In {{XC3FR|sub}} == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Pellurid Igna |image = Pellurid Igna FR.jpg |caption = Pellurid Igna |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Igna]] |level = 36 |area = [[Aurora Shelf]] ([[Declessa Cave Temple Ruins]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = }} '''Pellurid Ignas''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3FR}}. They are members of the [[Igna]] family, and can be found at level 36 at the [[Declessa Cave Temple Ruins]] on the [[Aurora Shelf]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{Fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:Aurora Shelf Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Ignas]] [[Category:XC3FR Ignas]] [[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 96-100 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 100+ Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 36-40 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox_NPC |name = Pergas |image = XC3 Pergas Icon.png |personality = |time_active = |gender = Male |race = [[Keves]]i human |age = 7th Term |location = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Colony 15]])
[[City]] }} '''Pergas''' is an NPC and in {{XC3}} who can be found in [[Colony 15]], and later in the [[City]]. {{clr}} == Battle == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Pergas |image = |caption = Pergas |category = [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |type = [[Keves Forces]] |level = 48 |area = [[Erythia Sea]] ([[Colony 15]]) |spawntime = During ''[[Doing It My Way]]'' |respawn = No |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |healing = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate-front = |guardrate-side = |guardrate-back = }} '''Pergas''' is a [[Quest Exclusive Enemy (XC3)|Quest Exclusive]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] in {{XC3}}. He is a [[Keves Forces|Keves Soldier]] who is fought at level 48 in [[Colony 15]] in [[Erythia Sea]] during ''[[Doing It My Way]]''. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:Cadensia Region NPCs]] [[Category:XC3 Kevesi]] [[Category:City NPCs]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Keves Forces]] [[Category:XC3 Level 46-50 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3 NPCs missing info]]

{{Infobox Gem | name = Perilous Presence | image = Gem-defender.png | effect = [Passive] Start each battle with aggro. | category = Defender }} '''Perilous Presence''' is a Defender [[Gem]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. == Gem Stats == While these stats are not directly visible, they can be seen when viewing a character's build. {| class="xc1 gem-stats centered" style="width: 200px" !Rank !Starting Aggro |- !I |500 |- !II |750 |- !III |1000 |- !IV |1250 |- !V |1500 |- !VI |1750 |- !VII |2000 |- !VIII |2250 |- !IX |2500 |- !X |3000 |} == List of Recipes== At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], [[Riku]] will [[Gem Crafting|craft]] [[Gem]]s using items picked up during adventures or acquired from [[enemy (XC3)|enemies]]. {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Perilwing Ryuho |image = XC3 Perilwing Ryuho (cropped).png |caption = Perilwing Ryuho |type = [[Vollgull]] |level = 100 |area = [[Melnath's Shoulder (XC3)|Melnath's Shoulder]] ([[Coolley Lake (XC3)|Coolley Lake]]) |category = [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] ([[Superboss]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Air |detection = Sight |hp = 8,525,050 |strength = 2,611 |healing = 617 |dexterity = 538 |agility = 520 |physdef = 0% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 30% |guardrate = 0% |exp = 11,731 |cp = 337 |sp = 25 |gold = 7,650 }} '''Perilwing Ryuho''' is a [[Superboss]] in {{XC3}}. It is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] and a member of the [[Vollgull]] family and can be initially found at level 100 at [[Coolley Lake (XC3)|Coolley Lake]] on [[Melnath's Shoulder (XC3)|Melnath's Shoulder]]. The [[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Eagle Rush]] [[Skill (XC3)|Skill]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it. Through re-challenging, Perilwing Ryuho's level can be increased to a maximum at level 160. ==Battle== ===Skills=== Perilwing Ryuho has several innate skills: *Extends Launch duration by 50%. *Extends Daze duration by 200%. ===Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances |break = 105% |topple = 0% |daze = 0% |burst = 0% |launch = 0% |smash = Immune |blowdown = Immune |knockback = Immune |physdebuff = 75% |etherdebuff = Immune }} {{clr}} ===Enraged=== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:70%;" !Trigger |Enemy is reduced to 50% HP. |- !Effects |style="text-align:left;"|Boosts damage dealt by 25%.
Boosts Art recharge speed by 50%.
Boosts evasion by 15% when HP is at 50% or lower. |} ===Arts=== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:150%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses !Notes !Use Conditions |- |'''''Auto-Attack''''' |Physical |One Target |1 |200% | | |Anytime |- |rowspan="2"|'''Hyperion Ray''' |rowspan="2"|Ether |rowspan="2"|Frontward AOE |rowspan="2"|1 |rowspan="2"|250% | [[Blowdown (XC3)|Blowdown]] / [[Accuracy Down]] | rowspan="2"| | When reduced to 80% HP during Lv 100-150 fights |- | [[Bind (XC3)|Bind]] | When reduced to 60% HP during Lv 160 fight |- |rowspan="2"|'''Raptor Catch''' |rowspan="2"|Physical |rowspan="2"|One Target |rowspan="2"|4 |rowspan="2"|400% |rowspan="2"|Grabs target during animation / [[Smash (XC3)|Smash]] on release |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Cannot affect [[Ouroboros]] forms. |When reduced to 80% HP during Lv 100-110 fights |- |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 50%. *Cannot affect Ouroboros forms. *Attack cannot be blocked. |When reduced to 80% HP during Lv 115-150 fights; anytime during Lv 160 fight |- |rowspan="3"|'''Frost Cannon''' |rowspan="3"|Ether |rowspan="3"|Frontward AOE |rowspan="3"|3 |720% |rowspan="3"|[[Freeze]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Damage from Freeze is boosted by 200%. *Each hit can only damage a single target in range. |Anytime during Lv 100 fight |- |1020% |rowspan="2" style="text-align:left;"| *Damage from Freeze is boosted by 300%. *Each hit can only damage a single target in range. |Anytime during Lv 105-150 fights |- | 1260% |When reduced to 80% HP during Lv 160 fight |- |rowspan="2"|'''Stratospheric Launch''' |rowspan="2"|Physical |One Target |rowspan="2"| 1 |rowspan="2"| 450% |rowspan="2"| [[Launch (XC3)|Launch]] |style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy and Critical Rate are boosted by 25%. |While above 80% HP on fights up to Lv 150, and when reduced to 60% HP during fights up to Lv 120 |- |AOE on Target | style="text-align:left;"| *Accuracy is boosted by 25%. |When reduced to 60% HP during Lv 125-160 fights; additionally when above 80% HP during Lv 160 fight |- |rowspan="2"|'''Assault Hawk''' |rowspan="2"|Physical |rowspan="2"|One Target |rowspan="2"|3 |rowspan="2"|800% |rowspan="2"|[[Daze (XC3)|Daze]] on third hit |style="text-align:left;"| *Critical Rate is boosted by 25%. |When reduced to 40% HP during fights up to and including Lv 130 |- |style="text-align:left;"| *Critical Rate is boosted by 25%. *Negates enemy guard; inflicts [[Break (XC3)|Break]] if guard is attempted. |When reduced to 40% HP during fights at Lv 135 or above |} === Superboss Challenges === After defeating it for the first time, Perilwing Ryuho can be re-fought at increasing levels by selecting the "Challenge" option on its [[Named Grave]]. After defeating it at a given challenge level, it will appear at the next challenge level the next time it is challenged, until reaching its maximum level. Thus, only the initial Lv 100 version and the final Lv 160 challenge version can be refought. Perilwing Ryuho has the following stats changed from its base Lv 100 version in each challenge version. Physical and Ether Defense, Critical Rate, Guard Rates and resistances are unchanged in these challenge versions. SP is not dropped from defeating it in a challenge, since the challenge counts as a refight. Lv 105=

Lv 105

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 14,863,850 |atk = 3,515 |heal = 988 |dex = 727 |agil = 705 |exp = 23,011 |cp = 441 |gold = 11,390 }} == Challenge Battle Mode== {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Perilwing Ryuho |image = |caption = Perilwing Ryuho |type = [[Vollgull]] |level = 160 |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Boss]] |spawntime = During ''[[The Four Devas]]'' |respawn = No |movement = Air |detection = |hp = 4,403,065 |strength = 1,148 |healing = 988 |dexterity = 728 |agility = 608 |physdef = 0% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 5% |guardrate = 0% }} Perilwing Ryuho is fought at level 160 during the second wave of the [[Challenge Battle Mode|Challenge Battle]] ''[[The Four Devas]]''. {{clr}} ==Gallery== Perilwing ryuho location.png Perilwing ryuho.png XC3 Perilwing Ryuho.jpeg {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Unique Monsters]] [[Category:XC3 Vollgulls]] [[Category:Aetia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 96-100 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 100+ Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Phantom Feather (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Phantom Feather |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Accrues Aggro every second. (Major effect.) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Phantom Feather |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Accrues Aggro every second. (Major effect.) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Phantom Feather |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Accrues Aggro every second. (Major effect.) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Phantom Feathers''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |category = Unique Monster |name = Phony Temnos |image = XC3 Hollow Ones.png |caption = Phony Temnos (Far Right) |type = [[Droids]] |level = 69 |area = [[Origin Interior]] ([[Hangar, Upper Level (Origin)|Hangar, Upper Level]]) |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = Ground |detection = |exp = 1,135 |cp = 67 |sp = 5 |gold = 552 |hp = 1,162,850 |strength = 1,289 |healing = 564 |dexterity = 248 |agility = 238 |physdef = 15% |ethdef = 0% |critrate = 5% |guardrate = 0% }} '''Phony Temnos''' is a [[Unique Monster (XC3)|Unique Monster]] in {{XC3}}. It is a member of the [[Droids]] family, and can be found at level 69 in the [[Origin Interior]], in the [[Hangar, Upper Level (Origin)|Hangar, Upper Level]]. It forms the quatuor "Hollow Ones" with [[Artificial Optho]], [[Vapid Roger]] and [[Dishonest Karom]]. The [[Soulhacker#Enemy Skills|Exoshell]] [[Skill (XC3)|Skill]] can be earned by the [[Soulhacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] by defeating it. == Resistances == {{XC3 Resistances |break = 45% |knockback = 50% |blowdown = 50% |physdebuff = 25% |etherdebuff = 60% }} {{clr}} == Gallery == <gallery> Hollow ones location.png Hollow ones temnos.png </gallery>
